Posts.EditableText: There is a StackExchange site proposal for Interactive Fiction: http://area51.stackexchange.com/proposa ... xMkQVQ6gg2 This would be an excellent resource. StackOverflow showed how to do Q&A on the web properly - much better for getting technical assistance than forums are. A similar site for IF would be amazing. Sign up and support this now!
Posts.HTML:
There is a StackExchange site proposal for Interactive Fiction:

http://area51.stackexchange.com/proposa ... xMkQVQ6gg2

This would be an excellent resource. StackOverflow showed how to do Q&A on the web properly - much better for getting technical assistance than forums are. A similar site for IF would be amazing. Sign up and support this now!
